channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘League Of Legends’ 14.14 Patch Notes Bring New Champion Aurora
item.description: League of Legends gets a brand new champion along with a new summer event and Vampire Survivors style game mode in the latest patch.

item.title: Bullies
item.description: Bullies use intimidation and power to force others to act against their best interests. Bullies blame the victim, assuring everyone that they wouldn’t...

item.title: Telomeres, Or How Your DNA Shrinks Over Time
item.description: Telomeres, tiny structures found at the ends of our chromosomes, are crucial to our understanding of aging. Could they be the secret to longer, health...

item.title: The page-a-day calendar
item.description: Time passes. And humans have always kept track. Distribution and technology combined to create a few decades where the tear off daily calendar was nea...

item.title: Here’s Where Temperatures Are Hottest Today—And When It Will Cool Down
item.description: Some 126 million people are under heat advisories Tuesday, and most of the extreme heat is focused on the East Coast and the South.

item.title: The distribution of character

item.title: The Prompt: The Mysterious Rise Of Trump’s AI Whisperer
item.description: Plus: A talking parrot’s videos are being used to train AI models.

item.title: Giving up vs. quitting
item.description: Shrug your shoulders, care less, phone it in. One software company I used to depend on has sort of given up. They have plenty of cash in the bank, but...

item.title: Exactly When Apple Will Launch iPhone 16 And iPhone 16 Pro
item.description: In around eight weeks, Apple will announce the iPhone 16 series. Here are full details of exactly when the phones will be announced and go on sale.

item.title: Student coach
